titles.title: Providing for the adjournment of the two Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Introduced in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 4/6/1995--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from April 7 until May 1, 1995, and from May 3 until May 9, 1995, and an adjournment or recess of the Senate from April 6, 7, 8, 9, or 10 until April 24, 1995.
